title: Eco-Barangay: Community E-Waste Collection System
description: A community-driven solution that coordinates e-waste collection from puroks to the barangay for safe and responsible disposal. The system streamlines pickup scheduling, tracking, and reporting to help local governments manage electronic waste effectively.
subtitle: Organizing E-Waste Collection for Cleaner Barangays

backgroundImage.alt: Abstract academic background with geometric patterns

features.title: Purok-Level Pickup Coordination
features.description: Residents schedule e-waste pickups at the purok level so collections can be consolidated at the barangay for proper disposal.

features.title: Collection Tracking & Reporting
features.description: Track inbound e-waste by category and generate reports for barangay officials to simplify disposal and recycling workflows.

features.title: Safe Handling Guidelines
features.description: Provide residents with clear instructions for preparing electronic waste (batteries, small appliances, devices) to reduce hazards during collection and storage.

features.title: Community Engagement & Incentives
features.description: Encourage participation through community drives, incentive programs, and transparent collection results shared with residents.

author: Eco-Barangay Development Team
